faqsData.question: What is Netherlands Offshore dedicated server?

answer.content: A Netherlands Offshore dedicated server refers to a type of web hosting service where an individual or organization rents an entire physical server that is located in the Netherlands, and that server is used exclusively for their own website or applications. The term offshore means your Netherlands offshore dedicated server is located in an offshore location where clients host their site with data privacy and legal considerations or different rules and regulations.

faqsData.question: Can I upgrade my Dedicated server to higher plan?

answer.content: Yes, you can upgrade your current Offshore dedicated server in the Netherlands with your choice of custom CPU, RAM, Storage, and bandwidth.

faqsData.question: Do you offer free migration for your DMCA Ignored dedicated server?

answer.content: Yes, we do offer completely free-of-cost migration for up to 5 GB* without causing any data loss. Moreover, we do not put any additional charges or hidden charges, but in case your website files have more data than 5GB, then it will be chargeable as guided by our policies.

faqsData.question: How many Dedicated IP Offered by you?

answer.content: We offer 1 IPv4 with our Netherlands offshore dedicated server. Moreover, if you need an additional IP Address, then open a Support Ticket.

faqsData.question: How do I get started with Offshore dedicated server?

answer.content: To get started with our offshore server, you just need to choose your favourite reliable offshore web hosting plan, enter your authentic details, and checkout! Your servers will be ready to use in just a few days, all thanks to our instant activation policy.

faqsData.question: Does QloudHost provide managed Offshore dedicated servers?

answer.content: On account of providing full flexibility and root access with our reliable dedicated server hosting solution, we don’t provide fully managed dedicated servers. Hence, you completely customize your servers as per your needs and requirements.

faqsData.question: How long does it take to activate my Offshore Server Netherlands?

answer.content: We offer our Shared and VPS services to the market with an instant activation policy, whereas DMCA Ignored Netherlands servers will be ready to use in 5-7 working days.
